questions.question: The associate ML engineer asks you what the ideal balance is between model bias and model variance. How would you respond?
options: Find the HIGHEST model bias and HIGHEST model variance that perform well on validation data.
The ideal balance is HIGH model bias and LOW model variance.
The ideal balance is LOW model bias and LOW model variance.
The ideal balance is LOW model bias and HIGH model variance.
correct_answers: The ideal balance is LOW model bias and LOW model variance.
